edu.ccsu.devices

Class LcdScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ccsu.devices.LcdScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Device, LightEnabledDevice, ScreenEnabledDevice

    public class LcdScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScreenEnabledDevice
    Class connects to LCD RGB Backlight and allows calling classes to print messages to the screen using a variety of methods.

      • setNextDevice

        public void setNextDevice(Device nextDevice)
                   throws IncompatibleDeviceError
        Description copied from interface: Device
        Sets another devices to be used in Chain of Responsiblity. If accessing current device fails and there is another device in the chain, device will try to use that next device to perform operations.
        Specified by:
        setNextDevice in interface Device
        Throws:
